name: Hellycoaster
description:
Build the deadliest rollercoaster!

Your goal is to kill as much people as possible to feed Satan with their souls. Fill your carts with fresh dammed by driving your train through hell’s rifts. Harvest their souls and bodies by killing them with traps before Satan’s patience goes empty.

Enjoy the never-ending bloodbath… and send us your highest score!

(Only supports QWERTY keyboards)

Note: Hellycoaster was made during Ludum Dare 47 Game Jam by :

- Maël "TennoTako" Gonzales - @tennotako

- Geoffrey "Anguish_bucket" Guingo - twitch.tv/anguish_bucket

- Bastien "Zab" Thouverez" - bthouverez.fr

- Rémi "Eiiko" Adriano - remiadriano.com
